com.sensoro.beacon.kit

Class SensoroBeaconManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensoro.beacon.kit.SensoroBeaconManager

  • public class SensoroBeaconManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can manage the sensoro beacon service.The class uses the singleton mode.If you want to get the instance of the class,use getInstance(Context)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SensoroBeaconManager.BeaconManagerListener
      The callback interface when beacons appear, disappear, update.

      • setBackgroundBetweenScanPeriod

        Parameters:

      • setBeaconExistTime

        public void setBeaconExistTime(long existTime)

        Set the exist time of a beacon.If the iBeacon can not be found in this duration,the iBeacon will not be int the arrayList in the callback SensoroBeaconService.onUpdateBeacon(java.util.ArrayList<com.sensoro.beacon.kit.Beacon>)

        if does not scan one beacon in exist time,than callback onGoneBeacon of this beacon
        Parameters:
        existTime - default value is 8 s(unit:ms)
